shulkerboxtooltip.config.option.colors.c: Controls whether the preview window should be colored.
shulkerboxtooltip.config.option.controls:
Press this key when hovering a container stack
to open the full preview window
Hold this key when previewing a stack to lock the tooltip.

Press this key when hovering a container stack
to open the preview window
If on, the preview is always displayed,
regardless of the preview key being pressed.

In compact mode, how should items with the same ID
but different component data be compacted?
Ignored:
 Ignores component data
First Item:
 Items are displayed as all having
 the same component as the first item
Separate:
 Separates items with different component data

The max number of items in a row
May not affect modded containers.

The position of the preview window.
Inside:
 Inside the item's tooltip.
Outside:
 Outside the item's tooltip, moves depending on the screen borders.
Outside (top):
 Always at the top of the item's tooltip.
Outside (bottom):
 Always at the bottom of the item's tooltip.

If on, the client will try to send packets to servers
to allow extra preview information
such as ender chest previews.
If on, large item counts in compact previews will be shortened.

Swaps the preview modes.
If true, pressing the preview key will show the full preview instead.

The theme to use for preview windows.
ShulkerBoxTooltip:
 ShulkerBoxTooltip's default look and feel.
Vanilla:
 Mimics the style of vanilla bundle previews.
shulkerboxtooltip.config.option.server.c: These options are for the servers to set. On multiplayer, changing these options from this menu will not affect the server's configuration.

If on, the server will be able to provide extra information
about containers to the clients with the mod installed.
Disabling this option will disable all of the options below.
shulkerboxtooltip.config.option.server.e:
Changes the way the ender chest content preview is synchronized.
None:
 No synchronization,
 prevents clients from seeing a preview of their ender chest.
Active:
 Ender chest contents are synchronized when changed.
Passive:
 Ender chest contents are synchronized
 when the client opens a preview.
If on, the mod hides the custom text on shulker box tooltips.
Use this option when a server-side preview datapack clashes with the mod.

Shows info about the current loot table of the item if present.
Visible only when Tooltip Type is set to Modded.
Hide:
 No loot table info, default.
Simple:
 Displays whether the stack uses a loot table.
Advanced:
 Shows the loot table used by the item.
Controls whether the key hints in the container's tooltip should be displayed.

The tooltip to use.
Vanilla:
 The vanilla tooltip (shows the first 5 items)
Modded:
 The mod's tooltip
None: No tooltip
shulkerboxtooltip.config.quit.confirm.wa: Are you sure you want to quit editing the config? Changes will be lost!
shulkerboxtooltip.config.restart_require: One of your modifications requires a restart to take effect.
shulkerboxtooltip.config.title: ShulkerBoxTooltip Configuration
